description: This project aims to assist VINACOSH in supporting comprehensive implementation of tobacco control laws—especially TAPS and smoke-free laws-- in Ha Noi, Hai Phong and Ho Chi Minh City and in 8 other cities and provinces supported by the national tobacco control fund, namely Ha Long, Tuyen Quang, Thai Nguyen, Hue, Da Nang, Hoi An, Nha Trang, Tien Giang.

name: Using evidence to develop effective and sustainable tax and price policies on all tobacco products aimed at curbing tobacco use in Vietnam (1)
org: Department of Tax Policy, Ministry of Finance of Vietnam
description: The aim of this project is to strengthen tobacco taxation policy based on best practice in order to reduce the affordability and consequently the consumption of tobacco products in the context of Vietnam. The project will develop an achievable and strategic road-map for tobacco tax increases based on evidence and best practice. In consultation with experts, policy-makers and other stakeholders it will develop and draft an amended excise tax law for the Government and for approval in 2014 by the National Assembly.

name: Using evidence to develop effective and sustainable tax and price policies on all tobacco products aimed at curbing tobacco use in Vietnam.
org: Department of Tax Policy, Ministry of Finance of Vietnam
description: The proposed project aims to strengthen the capacity of the Ministry of Finance to develop and disseminate evidence, communicate the need for an effective tobacco tax and price measure in Vietnam and build public and political support for the passage of the tobacco excise bill under consideration in 2014.

name: To assist Tax Policy Department of MoF in evaluating the impacts of tobacco tax policy changes upon illicit tobacco trade and government revenue
org: Department of Tax Policy, Ministry of Finance of Vietnam
description: The project purpose is to improve future tobacco tax policy and administration by developing a system for monitoring and evaluating impacts of tax policy changes on tobacco price, tax revenue and illicit trade. The intention is that the methodology that will be developed will then be approved and used officially by MoF and made available to partners working on tobacco control in Vietnam.

name: To assist Tax Policy Department of MoF in evaluating the impacts of tobacco tax policy changes upon illicit tobacco trade and government revenue
org: Department of Tax Policy, Ministry of Finance of Vietnam
description: The project purpose is to improve future tobacco tax policy and administration by developing a system for monitoring and evaluating impacts of tax policy changes on tobacco price, tax revenue and illicit trade. The intention is that the methodology that will be developed will then be approved and used officially by MoF and made available to partners working on tobacco control in Vietnam.

name: Toward Zero Tobacco Advertising, Promotion and Sponsorship in Vietnam.
description: To collect evidence on the violations of the current ban on tobacco advertising, promotion and sponsorship in Vietnam to advocate for the enforcement of the existing bans and advocate for the issuance of a complete ban on tobacco sponsorship in the draft tobacco control law in Vietnam.

name: Advocacy for comprehensive smoke-free policy implementation in Vietnam by measurement of PM2.5 in secondhand smoke in restaurants
description: The purpose of the project is to undertake an air quality monitoring study to assess the  pollution level of secondhand smoke (SHS) at selected restaurants in three cities of Vietnam, namely Hanoi, Hai Phong and Ho Chi Minh city. The purpose of the study is to build public support for 100% smoke free implementation, and show evidence that designated smoking areas do not  protect non-smokers from second hand smoke .

name: Communication and Advocacy for the effective implementation of regulations for zero tobacco advertising, promotion and sponsorship in Vietnam
description: The overall purpose of this project is to raise awareness of the TAPS ban amongst relevant stakeholders, and build capacity for implementation and enforcement of the provisions post May 2013. The project also seeks to support the development of the sub-law documents pertaining to TAPS ban, which will be instrumental in ensuring successful implementation of the newly passed Law on Tobacco Control.

name: Monitoring and advocacy for better enforcement of the ban on tobacco advertising and promotion, and for closure of gaps on existing policies at Points of Sale in Vietnam.
description: The overall purpose of the project is to provide evidence to showcase existing violation of the bans on Tobacco Advertising and Promotion (TAP), as well as to identify tactics of the tobacco industry at POSs in 10 different provinces throughout Viet Nam. The project will also provide focused support to Dong Thap province to pilot comprehensive implementation of the TAP Ban law. In completion of the 10 province study, and with lessons learnt from Dong Thap province, the project seeks to propose concrete recommendations for better enforcement as well as the closure of gaps on existing TAP policies.

name: Establishing smoke free models of restaurants and hotel in Ho Chi Minh City to support FCTC compliant Smoke Free Provisions within the national law.
org: Health Communication and Education Center of Ho Chi Minh City
description: The project seeks to increase support for implementing smoke free indoor areas at hotels and restaurants in HCMC, and to develop a feasible enforcement mechanism for Smoke Free implementation.

name: Strengthening the implementation and enforcement of smoke-free policies in Hanoi
description: To strengthen the implementation and enforcement of smokefree policies in Hanoi; through a sustained advocacy campaign, to increase political commitment for the implementation and enforcement of smokefree policies, to enhance the capacity of civil society and business owners to support smoke-free policies in public places; to increase public compliance with smoke-free laws and regulations by launching a sustained media campaign.

name: Strengthening the Tobacco Control Legislative Environment in Vietnam
description: The purpose of this project is to assist Vietnam in passing a strong tobacco control law by 2012, and effectively enforcing SF policy in public places and strong pictorial health warnings.

name: Supporting the effective implementation of Vietnam’s new national tobacco control law.
description: The overall purpose of this project is to assist the Vietnamese Government to effectively implement its new national tobacco control law, and to generate an environment conducive for passage of an effective tobacco tax policy in 2014, both of which will prevent and reduce tobacco consumption in Vietnam.

name: Strengthening implementation of Smoke Free in Restaurants of Hanoi
description: The purpose of this project is to support the Government of Vietnam to effectively implement its national smoke-free regulations in public places, focusing in particular on the hospitality sector of Hanoi.

name: Project to support the enforcement of smoke free transportation in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
org: Institute of Hygeine and Public Health at Ho Chi Minh City
description: The project aims to create and sustain a smokefree environment in public transportation in Ho Chi Minh City.  It will plan and establish an official instruction to ban smoking, strengthen the capacity of public transport staff to sustain tobacco control activities, conduct awareness activities, ensure effective enforcement and demonstrate the effectiveness of the project by increasing transport workers’ awareness of the policy by 50% and by achieving compliance rates of 80%.

name: Strategic communication campaign to support the adoption of a strong tobacco control law and the implementation of smoke-free environments
org: Vietnam Committee on Smoking and Health
description: The project is aiming for adoption of a strong tobacco control law and the implementation of smoke-free environments in Vietnam by mobilizing support of the policy makers and media. Working closely with partners, capacity building for tobacco control among the media and communication professionals will be accomplished.

name: Towards establishing sustainable funding for tobacco control and health promotion in Vietnam
org: Vietnam Committee on Smoking and Health
description: The project will work towards establishing sustainable funding for tobacco control and health promotion in Vietnam. It will develop a proposal for a tobacco-tax-based health promotion foundation to be submitted to the National Assembly. It will be implemented by an alliance of government and educational bodies, NGOs, and UN agencies.

name: Support for the adoption of a comprehensive tobacco control law and smokefree regulations
org: Vietnam Committee on Smoking and Health
description: The aim of this project is to ensure the adoption and implementation of a strong national tobacco control law and to ensure effective implementation of smoke regulations by authorized bodies.  The project will strengthen the capacity of national stakeholders to adopt and implement strong tobacco control legislation and smoke free regulations through workshops, study tours, strategic partnerships, provision of technical information and  support for development of enforcement guidelines.

name: Support for the Adoption of a Comprehensive Tobacco Control Law and Smoke-Free Regulations in Vietnam
org: Vietnam Committee on Smoking and Health
description: To help ensure the development and adoption by the National Assembly of a strong tobacco control law in Vietnam and ensure the effective implementation of new smokefree regulations by authorized bodies. To achieve this- in parallel to a grant from The Union- the main objective of this project is to conduct direct advocacy for the adoption of the national tobacco control law.

name: Establishing tobacco control funding in Vietnam
org: Vietnam Committee on Smoking and Health
description: This is a small grant to help move forward tobacco control funding planning in Vietnam and links to other VINACOSH projects

name: Building capacity and resources for communication of the newly enacted law, and expansion of Smoke Free best practices in Vietnam.
org: Vietnam Committee on Smoking and Health
description: The overall purpose of the project is to build capacity for communication and enforcement of the newly enacted law nationally by providing guidance and resources targeted at informing various sectors on the law, its associated roles and responsibilities, and continuously educating on the harms of tobacco. It also seeks to leverage the Smoke Free Tourism concept to build support from economically important and influential areas of the country for effective enforcement of smoke free in the hospitality sector.

name: Advocacy and communication campaign to raise support for increased tobacco taxation in Vietnam within the excise amendment of 2014.
org: Vietnam Committee on Smoking and Health
description: The purpose of the project is to advocate for increased tobacco taxes within the excise amendment reform scheduled to be passed in Nov 2014.

name: Build capacity for strengthening enforcement of smokefree policy in Vietnam using the network of Vietnam Public Health Association
description: The project aims to strengthen the implementation and enforcement of existing smokefree policy in government, health and educational facilities, and public transport in six provinces. It seeks greater commitment from local government and to build the capacity of Provincial Public Health Associations. It will advocate for a stronger national smokefree policy.

name: Build capacity for strengthening enforcement of smokefree policy in Vietnam using the network of Vietnam Public Health Association
description: The project aims to gain broader support from the public and civil society for implementation and enforcement of a smokefree policy in government offices and selected public places in six provinces, and to ensure the passage of the draft national tobacco control law in 2010. It will use capacity building, educational and advocacy materials and will mobilise local mass organisations.

name: Support the implementation and enforcement of smoke-free policy in Vietnam using the network of Vietnam Public Health Association
description: The aim of this project is to strengthen the implementation and enforcement of Vietnam's smoke free policy in government offices, health, education and public transportation facilities in two provinces.  It builds upon accomplishments in 6 other provinces and will build enforcement capacity of local leaders and designated enforcement offices in Thua Thien - Hue and Khanh Hoa provinces through provision of toolkits, guidelines, training and technical support.

name: Support comprehensive implementation and enforcement of Vietnam’s national tobacco control law in three strategic cities to serve as models for implementation for the rest of country.
description: The overall purpose of the project is to support comprehensive implementation and enforcement of Vietnam’s tobacco control law in three strategic cities to serve as models for implementation for the rest of country.

name: Support the expansion of smoke free hospitality settings in six cities and continued capacity building for the tobacco control law enforcement and evaluation.
description: The overall purposes of the project is to support the expansion of smoke free hospitality settings in six cities and continued capacity building for the tobacco control law enforcement and evaluation.

name: Building a stronger monitoring and evaluation system and capacity for tobacco control in Vietnam
description: To strengthen the systems and capacity for effective implementation, monitoring and evaluation of the Tobacco Control Law including best practice for tobacco retailer network management system in Vietnam.

name: Zambia Campaign for Tobacco Control
description: To advocate for comprehensive tobacco control legislation by launching a sustained lobbying campaign targeted towards Parliamentarians, by launching an awareness raising campaign for the public about the harmful effects of tobacco; and to conduct an education campaign on tobacco control aimed at Zambian women's groups, religious leaders, and doctors.

name: Smoke-free Enforcement Training of Trainers Workshop and Enforcement Monitoring
description: To support monitoring of enforcement of Zambian smoke-free legislation.
